rules_text:
Whenever one or more tokens enter the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Arietta, Who Caters to All.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Arietta onto other creatures.
rules_text2:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Omnivorous Spread: You gain 3 life.
When you sacrifice Omnivorous Spread, choose any number of tokens you control with different names. For each of them, create a token that’s a copy of it.
notes:
Changed names, added art, added flavor text
